overview:
Daivid Bailey is currently working on growing Moviestorm to 1m users worldwide.

He is a business creator and developer who is passionate about interactive entertainment in all its forms: PC, handheld, console and online. Bailey brings experience in entertainment, including machinima, media, film, television and online formats as well as in pure â€œgamesâ€.

Some key experiences of Bailey’s include periods as an Interim Executive (5 years), with an entrepreneurial start up (9 years). He has also spent time in the formation, promotion, finance, legal and management of a computer games developer in UK (6 years).
